title: Refining Frenzy - Novel Updates

description: An obscure metal card, was actually from the future of the Earth's game card. Ten times, hundreds of times, thousands of times to accelerate, endless endless time to create the greatest legend of refining division! Experienced a long time the ancient mountains of the birth of the strange mountain soul; magical and diverse Wicked, with the destruction of heaven and earth to destroy the animal, super animal; prosperous earth pulse surgery; tyrannical enough to control the supreme heaven and earth, to the holy; known as eternal Immortal and immortal land; endless earth rules ... ... these, will debut one by one. There is no wonder here, this is a vast world!>
